item.title: Hashbang /bin/zsh - Command Line Hacker Design - White Text

item.title: Bash Fork Bomb - Pink Text for Unix/Linux Hackers
item.description: How to create a fork bomb to crash a computer system running Linux or Unix? Use this cryptic Bash command “:(){ :|:& };:”, but actually don’t do it. Better show off your hacker knowledge. / Administrators, hackers, and some regular...

item.title: Alias "fu" to sudo last command - Funny Black Text Bash User Design
